snippet: A businessman angry at a judge trailed the judge and his colleagues to capture incriminating footage, which showed them with prostitutes at a glitzy nightclub.
abstract: Two judges and an official of Shanghai high court are expelled from Chinese Communist Party and dismissed from their jobs after being seen on video apparently consorting with prostitutes in nightclubs.

byline.contributor: Chris Buckley contributed reporting from Hong Kong.

lead_paragraph: A businessman angry at a judge trailed the judge and his colleagues to capture incriminating footage, which showed them with prostitutes at a glitzy nightclub.

headline.main: Chinese Judges Disciplined in Prostitution Scandal After Videos Circulate Online
headline.print_headline: Chinese Judges Disciplined in Prostitution Scandal After Videos Circulate Online
